E

ElasticSearch - Class in ca.ualberta.cs.drivr
In ElasticSearch, we store two classes: Requests and Users.
ElasticSearch(Context) - Constructor for class ca.ualberta.cs.drivr.ElasticSearch
 
ElasticSearchController - Class in ca.ualberta.cs.drivr
In ElasticSearchController, the actual calls to ElasticSearch are done.
ElasticSearchController() - Constructor for class ca.ualberta.cs.drivr.ElasticSearchController
 
ElasticSearchController.AddRequest - Class in ca.ualberta.cs.drivr
Here, a request is added to ElasticSearch by first building the add query for the document to be stored in ElasticSearch, then adding it into ElasticSearch, then immediately afterwards getting the ID where it's stored, appending it to the end of the add query and then replacing the query we just added with the new query including the ID.
ElasticSearchController.AddUser - Class in ca.ualberta.cs.drivr
Here, the user is either added or updated (since this class handles both) in ElasticSearch by building it then adding it in the ID which is the same as the user's unique username.
ElasticSearchController.GetUser - Class in ca.ualberta.cs.drivr
Here, we get a user profile by searching for the unique username and returning it when we find it.
ElasticSearchController.SearchForKeywordRequests - Class in ca.ualberta.cs.drivr
Here, all the requests that have the description containing the keyword given by the user will be gotten.
ElasticSearchController.SearchForLocationRequests - Class in ca.ualberta.cs.drivr
Here, the program will get take in the specified geolocation from the user, search within a 5 km radius for requests where the start locations are within that range and return the gotten requests.
ElasticSearchController.SearchForRequests - Class in ca.ualberta.cs.drivr
Here, all requests associated to a user are gotten by checking all rider and driver usernames to see if they contain the user's username, adding them to the ArrayList and then returning that ArrayList.
ElasticSearchController.UpdateRequest - Class in ca.ualberta.cs.drivr
 
ElasticSearchControllerTest - Class in ca.ualberta.cs.drivr
Tests for the ElasticSearch controller to make sure everything works accordingly.
ElasticSearchControllerTest() - Constructor for class ca.ualberta.cs.drivr.ElasticSearchControllerTest
 
ElasticSearchRequest - Class in ca.ualberta.cs.drivr
This class is used to hold the document gotten for requests in ElasticSearch before converting it to a proper request.
ElasticSearchRequest() - Constructor for class ca.ualberta.cs.drivr.ElasticSearchRequest
Constructor for ElasticSearchRequest.
ElasticSearchRequestTest - Class in ca.ualberta.cs.drivr
Tests (or, really, doesn't test) ElasticSearchRequest.
ElasticSearchRequestTest() - Constructor for class ca.ualberta.cs.drivr.ElasticSearchRequestTest
 
ElasticSearchTest - Class in ca.ualberta.cs.drivr
Tests for the methods in the ElasticSearch class.
ElasticSearchTest() - Constructor for class ca.ualberta.cs.drivr.ElasticSearchTest
 
emailImageView - Variable in class ca.ualberta.cs.drivr.RequestsListAdapter.ViewHolder
 
enableGPS() - Method in class ca.ualberta.cs.drivr.GPSTracker
Opens settings Activity to allow user to turn on GPS.
EXTRA_PLACE - Static variable in class ca.ualberta.cs.drivr.NewRequestActivity
The key used for passing a Place to this activity as an extra to an intent.
EXTRA_REQUEST - Static variable in class ca.ualberta.cs.drivr.RequestActivity
Used as a key for passing a request into this activity as an extra to an intent.
